com.compendium.core.db
Class DBViewTimeNode

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBViewTimeNode

public class DBViewTimeNode
extends java.lang.Object

The DBViewTimeNode class serves as the interface layer between the NodePositionTime objects and the ViewTimeNode table in the database.

Author:
Michelle Bachler

Field Summary
static java.lang.String DELETE_VIEWTIMENODE_QUERY
          SQL statement to delete a record
static java.lang.String GET_ANYVIEWNODE_QUERY
          SQL statement to return the ViewTimeNode records with the given ViewID, NodeID and TimeToShow, whatever the Status.
static java.lang.String GET_EXISTS_QUERY
          SQL statement to return whether the record with the given given ViewID, NodeID and TimeToShow exists and is marked for deletion.
static java.lang.String GET_NODETIMES_QUERY
          SQL statement to join the Node and the ViewTimeNode tables to return NodePositionTime objects in a given view, if the ViewTimeNode record was active.
static java.lang.String GET_VIEWTIMENODE_QUERY
          SQL statement to return the ViewTimeNode records with the given ViewID, NodeID and TimeToShow, if active.

                                      long nTimeToHide,
                                      int x,
                                      int y,
                                      java.lang.String userID)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts a new viewtimenode record in the database and returns a NodePositionTime object representing this record.

update

public static NodePositionTime update(DBConnection dbcon,
                                      java.lang.String sViewTimeNodeID,
                                      View view,
                                      NodeSummary node,
                                      long nTimeToShow,
                                      long nTimeToHide,
                                      int x,
                                      int y,
                                      java.lang.String sUserID)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
Update a viewtimenode record in the database and returns a NodePositionTime object representing this record.

Parameters:
dbcon - the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sViewTimeNodeID - the unique id for this new record.
view - the view to insert the node into.
node - the node to insert into the view.
nTimeToShow - the time to show the node.
nTimeToHide - the time to hide the node.
x - the x position of the node in the view.
y - the y position of the node in the view.
userID - the id of the current user.
Returns:
NodePosition object.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

sViewTimeNodeID - the id of the record to delete.
userID - the id of the current user.

java.sql.SQLException

                             java.lang.String sViewTimeNodeID)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns whether a current record exists.

Parameters:
dbcon - the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sViewTimeNodeID - the id of the record to check.
Returns:
boolean true if the record exists, else false.

java.sql.SQLException

getNodeTimes

public static java.util.Vector getNodeTimes(DBConnection dbcon,
                                            java.lang.String sViewID,
                                            java.lang.String userID)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns the array of NodePositionTime objects in the given view.

Parameters:
dbcon - the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sViewID - the id of the View to return the NodePositions for.
userID - the id of the current user.
Returns:
Vector a list of NodePosition objects for the given view id.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
